2 Anak Buah Mundur Saat Heboh Anggaran Aneh, Ini Kata Anies
01 Nov 2019, 17:10 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Dua bawahan Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan, mundur dalam waktu berdekatan di saat rencana anggaran 2020 sedang jadi sorotan. Apa kata Anies?
Dua kepala dinas yang mundur ialah Kepala Dinas Pariwisatan dan Kebudayaan (Kadisparbud) DKI, Edy Junaedi, serta Kepala Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Daerah (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra. Terkait Mahendra, dia menyampaikan pengunduran diri langsung ke Anies dan ikut jumpa pers bersama.
"Jadi Pak Mahendra kemarin beliau menyampaikan kepada saya dan beliau sampaikan bahwa dia akan aktif di sana dan di sini. Dia memilih untuk orang lain. Saya bilang putusan itu kita hormati, Pak Mahendra," kata Anies saat jumpa pers di Balai Kota DKI, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Terkait Edy, Anies mengaku belum bertemu langsung. Dia belum tahu alasan persis Edy mundur dari jabatan Kadisparbud DKI.
"Adapun terkait Pak Edy, beliau belum pernah ketemu saya, belum pernah menyampaikan. Beliau menyerahkan surat pengunduran diri, tapi belum ketemu dan belum ada informasi lebih jauh. Dari informasi yang disampai kepada kita, memang pada hari ini ibunda beliau sedang sakit dan beliau tidak berada di Jakarta karena mengunjungi ibunya yang sedang sakit. Jadi kebetulan saja waktunya bersamaan," ungkap Anies.

2 subordinates retreat when the budget is weird, Anies said
01 Nov 2019, 17:10 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Two subordinates of DKI Jakarta Governor, Anies Baswedan, resigned in close proximity when the 2020 budget plan was in the spotlight. What did Anies say?
The two heads of service who resigned were the Head of the Jakarta Tourism and Culture Office (Kadisparbud), Edy Junaedi, and the Head of the Regional Development Planning Agency (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra. Regarding Mahendra, he submitted his resignation directly to Anies and joined a joint press conference.
"So Mr. Mahendra yesterday he conveyed to me and he said that he would be active there and here. He chose for others. I said that we respect the decision, Mr. Mahendra," Anies said during a press conference at the City Hall in Jakarta, Jakarta Center, Friday (11/01/2019).
Regarding Edy, Anies said that he had not met in person. He did not yet know the exact reason Edy resigned from the office of the Head of Culture and Tourism Office in Jakarta.
"As for Pak Edy, he has never met me, never delivered. He submitted a letter of resignation, but has not yet found and there is no further information. From the information conveyed to us, indeed today his mother is ill and he is not "I was in Jakarta because I was visiting her mother who was sick. So it just happened to be the same time," said Anies.
